import React,{useState}from'react';import{doc,updateDoc,addDoc,collection}from'firebase/firestore';import GlassCard from'./common/GlassCard';import{COLORS}from'../constants';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OpenSpecificAccountPage=_ref=>{let{type,userProfile,setUserProfile,setCurrentView,db,appId,auth}=_ref;const[formData,setFormData]=useState({initialDeposit:'',discordMessageLink:''});const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const generateDebitCardDetails=()=>{const num=Array(4).fill(0).map(()=>Math.floor(1000+Math.random()*9000)).join(' ');const issueDate=new Date('2005-01-01');// Start date for all cards
